```{r}
# look at one specific fish
fishCode <- "LT001"
fish_of_interest <- (data.frame(processed_data[processed_data$fishNum == fishCode, ]))
fish_of_interest <- fish_of_interest[order(fish_of_interest$pingNumber, decreasing = F)]
# set n threshold
indicator_n <- 5
lst_of_ping <- c(0)

for (i in 1:(nrow(fish_of_interest) - 1)){
  if (fish_of_interest[i + 1,]$pingNumber - fish_of_interest[i,]$pingNumber >= indicator_n){
    lst_of_ping <- c(lst_of_ping, i)
  }
}
lst_of_ping
```
